amendment.description: An amendment numbered 39 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of Secretary Antony J. Blinken to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
